task.title: Adding a due date
task.shortdesc: Add due dates to your cards to ensure the tasks they represent get completed on time.

context.p: To add a due date to a card, perform the following actions:

step.cmd: Click on the card to which you would like to add a due date.
In the ADD TO CARD area, click Due Date.
In the Change Due Date panel, enter the date and time of the due date.
In the Set Reminder dropdown, select when you would like to be reminded of the card's due date.
